item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 16 Aug 2022
item.description:
1. Emacs on windows, merlin mode, merlin server remote on linux, tramp, ssh
  2. clangml 4.2.0: OCaml bindings for Clang API (for C and C++ parsing)
  3. opam 2.1.3
  4. Application-specific Improvements to the Ecosystem
  5. Use GitHub CI to build simple binary distribution?
  6. setup-dkml.yml GitHub Actions workflow for distributing binaries
  7. Diskuv OCaml 1.x.x; Windows OCaml installer no longer in preview
